content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, I initially had higher expectations. However, considering your interest, let's start the negotiation with a price of 1150 Euros per month. If you find this satisfactory, say 'I agree to the price of 1150 Euro!' to finalize the agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I can offer you 900 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial goal was to secure a higher rental price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
